content: repeat from * round 17 *knit until 6st to marker k2tog knit to marker repeat from * round 19 *knit until 8st to marker k2tog knit to marker repeat from * round 21 *knit until 2st to marker k2tog knit to marker repeat from * cont decrease in this manner by following the instructions from round 3 onwards decreasing 7st every second round remembering to knit every other round until 28 sts rem next row k2tog around … 14 sts next row k2tog around … 7 sts finishing off break off yarn leaving a long tail thread end through the 7 stitches sts draw up tightly and fasten_off securely weave the yarn tails in on the wrong side of the work a pompom can be added if you wish when weaving in the tail for the cast on please take into consideration if the beanie is being folded back or not and select the side you will weave the end in on abbreviations k2tog knit 2 together pm place marker ©beccatknits 2015 all rights reserved pattern is for personal use only 4
